trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_00<tab>It is a cool and collected Sergeant Wiltswys who seeks an obliger today, rather than the heartsore fire-eater of the other day.

TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_01<tab>Wiltswys's meticulous scrutiny has discovered an unacceptable shortfall in the poison cabinet. Whilst she checks the other deadly yet life-saving items in the camp's inventory, you have a task to perform: stalk the majestic Rothlyt pelicans and extract three vials' worth of poison.

TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_02<tab>Exactly <var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var> the poison is secreted is a matter too discomfiting to discuss. It must suffice to say that the pelicans did not survive your exertions. Return to Wiltswys and give her the pelican poison.

TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_SEQ_03<tab>It seems that the way to Sergeant Wiltswys's heart is through a job well done. Listening to her tale of the Sahagin and the lost settlement, you see that she has no home but this vale and no family but the Maelstrom─and she will fight to the death to defend both...
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the vials of pelican poison to Wiltswys.
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_000<tab>Weapons and armor...in order. Saltpeter, in order. Basic provisions...all in order. Poisons─oh? This vial's near gone.

TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_001<tab>Uh, adventurer─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was it? Mayhap we can let bygones be bygones. You are skilled in wrangling beasts, I hear, and I have a need of pelican poison.
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_002<tab>The poison can be readily gathered from pelicans in the area, but I must continue my duties here. Are you so minded to undertake the task?
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_020<tab>I welcome your return, adventurer. Have you what I asked for?

TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_030<tab>Ah, I see you were not stinting in filling the vials! The last adventurer returned with each barely half-full and had the cheek to demand full payment. I have had a low opinion of adventurers since, but...
TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_031<tab>You know of our past with the kobolds, but they are not the foe we fight today. Nay, all our guns are trained on the fishbacks.

TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_032<tab>Such a wee thing, this vial─but this too is a gun. So susceptible the Sahagin are to pelican poison that even the rawest recruit may, with a poison-tipped arrow, find herself a fisher of beastmen.

TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_033<tab>There was a settlement here once, near Halfstone. Then the primal Leviathan rose, and the Sahagin invaded. Work of generations was undone in a season, and whole families perished.

TEXT_SUBSEA162_01148_WILTSWYS_000_034<tab>I never knew the Halfstone settlement, but I believe it to be a home worth fighting for. And so we fight, with steel, fire, and even poison to reclaim that which is ours.
